programme.title: Boris Yeltsin's White House visit
programme.short_synopsis: Boris Yeltsin's visit to the White House in June 1991 contrasts with his one in 1989,
programme.medium_synopsis: Yeltsin's visit contrasts to one he made in '89 when the US favoured Gorbachev. A bizarre encounter with Senator William Cohen of Maine, and an end to the trials of Oliver North.
